name: Tubble in the Land of Blobs
name_original: Tubble in the Land of Blobs
description:
Tubble in the Land of Blobs is a submission for the Lost Relic Games 2022 Game Jam.

Gameplay

There's currently five worlds/levels.

You start each level with your tower in the middle, and a rope attached. Run towards a blue or red spot on the ground to connect the tower.

  • Red will increase the number of bullets your tower shoots.
  • Blue will power the tower, at least one is required for the tower to do anything, more will make it shoot faster.
  • If you run towards the last connected segment, it will detach and follow the player again.

The shop is the little boat in the lower left of the world map.

Controls

All menus are controlled via mouse

During gameplay:

WASD/Arrow keys
MoveEscapeDestroy tower and return to world map
RReload current level
